name: To The Castle!
description:
You are a wizard who has just found that some catastrophe threatens the castle, you live on the edge of the kingdom and will need to run through rough terrain to get to the castle to warn the king.

Run and jump to work your way to the castle and warn the king of the incoming disaster.

(This game is a work in progress and is nowhere near finished.)
Move left and right with the arrow keys and jump with the spacebar
